医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
重新思考理想家庭：全球研究发现独生子女可能成为新常态对八个低生育率国家的综合研究揭示了理想家庭观念的转变，尽管存在文化差异，但强调家庭理想的一致性，令人惊讶的是倾向于生一个孩子就足够了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240203/Rethinking-the-ideal-family-Global-study-finds-one-child-may-be-the-new-norm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240203/Rethinking-the-ideal-family-Global-study-finds-one-child-may-be-the-new-norm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fcdabbd-ad2d-4560-8c67-c253c15b26d4 Sat, 03 Feb 2024 19:54:00 -0500 Rethinking the ideal family: Global study finds one child may be the new norm
CAR T 细胞靶向衰老细胞，改善小鼠的健康寿命近年来，嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞已经改变了血癌的治疗方法。并且有积极的迹象表明，“活体药物”可以用于治疗其他疾病，例如自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/CAR-T-cells-target-senescent-cells-improve-healthspan-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/CAR-T-cells-target-senescent-cells-improve-healthspan-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cb033f9-8f51-4d3d-ac43-5ffdd8dc3257 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:58:20 -0500 CAR T cells target senescent cells, improve healthspan in mice
新疫苗可能是胰腺癌、结直肠癌的潜在现成治疗方法根据纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的研究人员共同领导的一项研究，一种新疫苗显示出令人鼓舞的早期结果，作为某些胰腺癌或结直肠癌患者的潜在现成治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/New-vaccine-may-be-pottial-off-the-shelf-treatment-for-pancreatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/New-vaccine-may-be-pottial-off-the-shelf-treatment-for-pancreatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1e4fd7-9a35-4363-820d-6d1d31c84850 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:50:10 -0500 New vaccine may be potential off-the-shelf treatment for pancreatic, colorectal cancer
新抑制剂药物有望预防糖尿病眼病和肾病新研究表明，一种新型抑制剂药物可以预防微血管糖尿病并发症，例如糖尿病眼病和肾脏疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/New-inhibitor-drug-shows-promise-in-preventing-diabetic-eye-and-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/New-inhibitor-drug-shows-promise-in-preventing-diabetic-eye-and-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2adff51c-08be-470a-a64e-fce80abffdff Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:40:00 -0500 New inhibitor drug shows promise in preventing diabetic eye and kidney disease
言语无障碍项目开始招募美国和波多黎各中风幸存者言语无障碍项目已开始招募患有中风的美国和波多黎各成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Speech-Accessibility-Project-starts-recruitment-of-US-and-Puerto-Rican-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Speech-Accessibility-Project-starts-recruitment-of-US-and-Puerto-Rican-rinkle-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90cc79fb-18b6-4114-80d6-c594a16bdc0a Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:29:36 -0500 Speech Accessibility Project starts recruitment of U.S. and Puerto Rican stroke survivors
亚利桑那州立大学教授对 Neuralink 的 PRIME 研究可能得出的结论发表见解本周，Neuralink 的埃隆·马斯克宣布，其精密机器人植入脑机接口（PRIME）研究的人体临床试验已经开始，这是一项使用无线脑机接口的医疗设备试验，旨在使瘫痪患者能够控制外部设备他们的想法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/ASU-professor-offers-insights-on-what-may-be-coming-from-Neuralinke28099s-PRIME-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/ASU-professor-offers-insights-on-what-may-be-coming-from-Neuralinke28099s-PRIME-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76342260-8e83-4807-9349-2afc1c19130f Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:26:19 -0500 ASU professor offers insights on what may be coming from Neuralink’s PRIME study
研究表明低剂量的镉如何对肺上皮细胞产生有害应激接触香烟烟雾与慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）的发展和严重程度有关，慢性阻塞性肺病是全球第三大死因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-shows-how-low-dose-of-cadmium-products-deleterious-stress-in-lung-apphire-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-shows-how-low-dose-of-cadmium-products-deleterious-stress-in-lung-appli-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c652258-527c-469c-8866-a46dd6b61eda Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:23:12 -0500 Study shows how low dose of cadmium produces deleterious stress in lung epithelial cells
研究人员发现基因表达错误后保护组织的机制DNA 形式的遗传物质包含对每个人类和动物细胞的正常功能至关重要的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Researchers-discover-mechanism-that-protects-tissue-after-faulty-gene-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Researchers-discover-mechanism-that-protects-tissue-after-faulty-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22a4c4b8-efcc-48ca-9cbd-85239c826dbf Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:17:36 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism that protects tissue after faulty gene expression
蛋白质基因组学揭示了克服急性髓系白血病耐药性的新靶点医生有近十几种新的靶向药物来治疗急性髓系白血病（AML）患者，但四分之三的患者仍会在五年内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Proteogenomics-reveals-new-target-for-beating-drug-resistance-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Proteogenomics-reveals-new-target-for-beating-drug-resistance-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b34dad-ac57-47e0-abe0-885149b95e37 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:13:18 -0500 Proteogenomics reveals new target for beating drug resistance in acute myeloid leukemia
研究揭示羊毛硫抗生素防腐剂对肠道微生物组的影响食品制造商经常在食品中添加防腐剂以保持新鲜。这些防腐剂的主要目的是杀死可能分解或破坏食物的微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-reveals-impact-of-lantibiotic-preservatives-on-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-reveals-impact-of-lantibiotic-preservatives-on-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed4c4b26-0ea9-468e-a386-8da1305fd78f Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:08:47 -0500 Study reveals impact of lantibiotic preservatives on gut microbiome
